Project Emissions

According to the registered PDD /05/ and applied methodology ACMOOO2, Version 16.0 /07/, Project emissions shall be accounted by using the following equation:

PEy = PErry + PEapy+ PExp,y

Where:

PEy = Project emissions in year y (tCO2e/yr)

PErry = Project emissions from fossil fuel consumption in year y (tCO2/yr)

PEgpy = Project emission from the operation of geothermal power plants due to the release of non-condensable gases in year y (tCO2/yr)

PEnpy = Project emission from water reservoirs of hydro power plants in year y (tCO2/yr)

Project emissions from fossil fuel consumption (PErry)

Project is hydro power plant hence inapplicable and PEcp,y = 0.
